headline.main: WOUNDED REPORTERS REACH CAIRO SAFELY; Left Greece With British After Voyage in Rowboat

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Friday, May 2 (AP) -- Two wounded American newspaper men, one of them Robert St. John of The Associated Press, reached safety here early today after living through the successive dangers of a 400-mile voyage in a small boat and the British evacuation from Greece.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
